remarks: A homotopy from a path to itself.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2015.)
statement:
phtpyid.1 $e |- G = ( x e. ( 0 [,] 1 ) , y e. ( 0 [,] 1 ) |-> ( F ` x ) ) $.
phtpyid.3 $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( II Cn J ) ) $.
phtpyid $p |- ( ph -> G e. ( F ( PHtpy ` J ) F ) ) $.
$d F x y $.
$d J x y $.
$d ph x y $.
